title: accidentally purchased a champion with rp
body: I accidentally purchase a champion with my RP instead of IP. i was saving up rp for the new zed skin coming out. I accidentally bought thresh and havent played with him. How can i refund him?

replies.body:
If you have any of your three refund tokens, then you can definitely process this refund by following these few steps (outlined in the Content Refund FAQ):

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ#h2q1

If you run into any issues or problems, don't hesitate to holler!
